long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide unwanted elements on any webpage with a simple right-click! Customize your browsing experience by removing distractions quickly and effortlessly.

How to use it?
Just right-click on the element you want to hide and select 'Hide Element' from the context menu.

Note: This extension may not work on every website.
